sentences.cn: 无论如何, 雅皮愿意去那儿.

sentences.en: My friend is a yuppie. He lives in a huge house in Beverly Hill and earn $ 85,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 我朋友是城市里一个雅皮士. 他住在贝费利希尔斯的一所大房子里,年薪为八万五千美元.

sentences.en: The Porsche 911 reminds me of the worst parts of the yuppie era.
sentences.cn: 这辆保时捷911让我想起了雅皮士时代最不堪的那些日子。

sentences.en: They created the teenager , the yuppie, the baby boomer, the singleton and the metrosexual.
sentences.cn: 他们把消费者划分为:青少年, 婴儿潮, 单身主义者和都市玉男.

trans.tran_cn: （美）雅皮士（属于中上阶层的年轻专业人士）
trans.tran_en: a young person with a professional job who seems to be interested only in earning a lot of money and buying expensive things
